caption: The video begins with one soldier frantically stabbing another soldier in the chest with a bayonet. The soldier tried his best to lie down next to the enemy soldier. Then he saw that the enemy soldier was struggling to breathe, and tried to get up to stifle his mouth. The soldier then took out a branch and raised his helmet high above his head, only to be hit by enemy bullets once it was exposed. Then the man saw that the enemy soldier was still alive and struggling for his life. The man seems to have agreed to the request of the enemy soldier before his death, and picked up some water in the pool to feed the dying enemy soldier. Then the enemy soldier died a painful death, and the man was desperate on the battlefield full of battlefield wounds.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, decades ago, now, or in the future?
global.answer: It happens decades ago, most likely during a world war.

breakpoint.answer: He's trying to give his battle companion some water to drink.
